column1: When boiling butter, when it's ready, you can \n (A) Pour it onto a plate (B) Pour it into a jar
To permanently attach metal legs to a chair, you can \n (A) Weld the metal together to get it to stay firmly in place (B) Nail the metal together to get it to stay firmly in place
column2: Weld the metal together to get it to stay firmly in place

column1: how do you indent something? \n (A) leave a space before starting the writing (B) press the spacebar
column2: leave a space before starting the writing
